title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying it
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Enter three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Re-open the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Re-open the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB: The default value should not be lost and should remain as 'aaa' after modifying it.
SR:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Enter three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Re-open the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Re-open the Edit Parameter dialog and verify that the default value is still 'aaa'.
